price: 105. Waxaanu ku qornay Zabuurka30 kaddib (markaan horay ugu) xusnay Kitaabka31 in arlada (Jannada) ay dhaxli addoomahyaga wanaagsan.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَتَبۡنَا فِي ٱلزَّبُورِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ أَنَّ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ يَرِثُهَا عِبَادِيَ ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ
footnotes:
30. Zabuur waa kitaabkii loo waxyooday Nabi Daawuud c.s.Waxaa sidoo kale la yidhi waxaa loola jeedaa Kutubta Alle oo dhan. 
31. Waa Towraadda, waxaa sidoo kale lagu fasiray Looxa Maxfuudka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad katabnā fī al-zabūri min baʿdi al-dhik'ri anna al-arḍa yarithuhā ʿibādiya al-ṣāliḥūna
